customer.heading: Transform Your Everyday Life
customer.body: Find Trusted Local Services in Minutes ——Browse top-rated professionals, compare prices, read real reviews, and book instantly.

provider.heading: Turn Your Skills into an Online Business.
provider.body: Voo instantly creates a professional website for your services. Showcase your work, manage your schedule, message clients, and accept payments  ——all from one platform with your own unique site.
provider.tagline: Your all-in-one business site, scheduler, and payment processor.

customerFeatures.title: Find the Help You Need, Whenever You Need It
customerFeatures.description: At Voo, we make it easy for you to connect with reliable and skilled helpers in your area. Whether you need a coach, a cleaner, or any other service, you’ll find the perfect fit.

items.title: Transparent Pricing & Availability
items.description: View prices, check availability, and book helpers that best fit your budget and schedule. No surprises, just straightforward pricing and hassle-free scheduling.

items.title: Explore Profiles & Reviews
items.description: Get to know your helper before booking. Each profile includes details about their skills, experience, and services. Plus, customer reviews and ratings help you make an informed choice, ensuring you're choosing the right person for the job.

items.title: Effortless Booking Process
items.description: Our booking system is simple and efficient. Once you book, you can edit your appointment and wait for final approval before confirmation, ensuring everything is perfect.

providerFeatures.title: Grow Your Business, Easily and Securely
providerFeatures.description: Helping others has never been easier or more rewarding. With Voo, you can grow your business, stay organized, and get paid quickly and securely.

items.title: Share Your Personal Profile Link
items.description: Easily showcase your skills and services with a personalized link, making it simple for customers to book and for you to track all your bookings in one place.

items.title: Manage Your Time with Ease
items.description: Keep track of your scheduled jobs and block out availability directly from your calendar. Our platform keeps you organized so you can focus on delivering great service.

items.title: Guaranteed & Secure Payments
items.description: Payments are collected in advance, providing smooth experience and reliability for your work. No delays, no worries—just fast, hassle-free payouts you can trust.

hero.title: Get Booked. Get Paid. It's That Simple.
hero.subtitle: The easiest way to turn your passion into a side hustle or full-time gig. Get your first clients with a pro website, simple scheduling, and easy marketing—no experience required.

website.label: Your Pro Website
website.title: Your Professional Website
website.description: Get a stunning, no-code website in minutes. Showcase your work and impress clients from the moment they land on your page.

scheduling.label: Smart Scheduling
scheduling.title: Effortless 24/7 Bookings
scheduling.description: Set your availability and let clients book you online anytime. End the back-and-forth emails and never miss an opportunity.

ai.label: AI Social Growth
ai.title: Effortless Marketing, Real Growth
ai.description: Simply upload your latest work, and our AI instantly crafts engaging posts. We even run targeted ad campaigns to put your services in front of new local clients.

messaging.label: Client Messaging
messaging.title: All Conversations, One Place
messaging.description: Keep every client message, file, and project approval organized and accessible. Say goodbye to scattered communication.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: No subscriptions. No hidden costs. You choose how you get paid for bookings.

items.title: Auto Mobile
items.description: Whether it's routine maintenance or an emergency repair, our mobile auto services bring the mechanic to you, making car care more convenient than ever.

items.title: Coaching
items.description: Personalized coaching for sports, fitness, career growth, and more — helping you reach your goals.

items.title: Housekeeping
items.description: Our trusted housekeeping services will make your home shine. Enjoy a cleaner, more organized space with ease.

items.title: Delivery
items.description: Fast, reliable, and professional delivery services for packages of all sizes.

items.title: Handyman Services
items.description: From minor repairs to home improvement, our handymen will fix anything. Get the job done right with skilled professionals at your service.

items.title: Pet Services
items.description: From pet grooming to sitting, we provide top-quality care for your furry friends, ensuring they stay happy and healthy when you're away.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: By using our services, you agree to our terms. Learn more about your rights and responsibilities.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. Read how we protect and use your data responsibly.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions? We're here to help! Reach out to our support team.

Footer.copyright: © {year} Voo Dev LLC. All Rights Reserved.
